mapper.insert: insert into product_media_resource (id, ref_Id, type, url, account_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{refId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
